name: Cog and Chain
description:
You are a gentleman smashing weird Robots with your Cog flail.

Use WASD to move, right/left click to shoot out the cog, left click to retract it and right click to grapple to the cog.

Jellyfish robot heals you when killed, gearbot deals contact-damage and spider bot shoots stuff.

Developer Highscore over 10000
